meanings.definition: A type of volcano characterized by a conical shape and frequent eruptions.
meanings.sent1: The explorers marveled at the majestic etnas in the distance.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of etnas to understand volcanic activity.
meanings.sent3: During the picnic, the children pretended the sandcastle was an erupting etnas.
meanings.sent4: Her anger bubbled like a dormant etnas, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The documentary captured the raw power of nature through footage of erupting etnas.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'etna', referring to the volcanic mountain in Sicily.
meanings.sent1: In Sicily, visitors can see the famous etnas towering over the landscape.
meanings.sent2: Local legends speak of ancient gods residing within the etnas of Sicily.
meanings.sent3: The villagers celebrated the harvest festival with a dance around the etnas.
meanings.sent4: The history books recounted the eruptions of the legendary etnas.
meanings.sent5: Tourists captured breathtaking photos of the snow-capped etnas against the blue sky.
